thread.title: Coal Miner Next to Trump Believes That He Will Keep Up on His Campaign Promises
thread.title_full: Coal Miner Next to Trump Believes That He Will Keep Up on His Campaign Promises

author: K. Campbell
title: Coal Miner Next to Trump Believes That He Will Keep Up on His Campaign Promises
text:
Press Goes Nuts Over Surprise Trump Pulled on Christie During White House Visit 
“I’ve been in this industry 40 years,” Nelson explained. “I’m excited for the people who work in this industry.” 
Coal industry workers had been promised jobs “for the longest time,” Nelson said, but it had not happened, which was why it was of utmost importance to him and countless others that Trump uphold his promise to cut regulations . 
“For a politician, such as Donald Trump, to step up and hold good to his promise, is absolutely fantastic. He’s an inspiration to all working Americans,” Nelson   
And, while environmental groups, like Greenpeace USA , have been warning against Trump’s pro-coal agenda as “potentially dangerous,” Nelson wanted Americans to understand the truth of the situation — and know that the environmental concerns are overblown. 
Watch Nelson’s “Fox & Friends” interview here:
